courses.title: Beginner Guitar Lessons
courses.description: Learn the basics of playing the guitar, from chords to strumming patterns.

courses.title: Piano for Beginners
courses.description: Start your journey with piano, covering basic notes and simple melodies.

courses.title: Advanced Violin Techniques
courses.description: Master advanced techniques for playing the violin.

courses.title: Jazz Improvisation
courses.description: Learn to improvise in the jazz style, focusing on scales, modes, and phrasing.

courses.title: Electronic Music Production
courses.description: Create your own electronic music using popular software and production techniques.

courses.title: Songwriting Masterclass
courses.description: Learn the art of songwriting, covering lyrics, melody, and composition.
